sentences.sContent: Beech turns easily in the lathe.
sentences.sCn: 山毛榉在车床上很容易车制。

sentences.sContent: That lathe went out of order at times.
sentences.sContent_eng: That lathe went out of order at times.
sentences.sCn: 那台车床有时发生故障。

sentences.sContent: When the plant closed, a lathe came sliding down, like a foot a day, until it hit an oak.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the plant closed, a lathe came sliding down, like a foot a day, until it hit an oak.
sentences.sCn: 那家工厂倒闭的时候，还滑下来过一架车床，差不多一天出溜一尺，直到它撞上了一棵橡树。

trans.tranOther: a machine that shapes wood or metal, by turning it around and around against a sharp tool
